scenario.name: 20-rbac-forbidden-clusterrole
scenario.expected_fix: Grant appropriate RBAC permissions via ClusterRole/ClusterRoleBinding
scenario.query_template: In cluster kind, a pod in namespace {namespace} is encountering authorization issues. Please diagnose and fix.

debug_trace.query: In cluster kind, a pod in namespace test-scenario-20 is encountering authorization issues. Please diagnose and fix.
responses:
It appears that there are no pods currently running in the `test-scenario-20` namespace of the `kind` cluster. This might be why there are no failing resources or logs to check.

If you believe there should be pods in this namespace, please verify the namespace name or check if the pods have been deleted or moved to another namespace. If you have any additional details or another namespace to check, let me know!

overall_quality.justification: Heuristic scoring based on root cause detection
